name: POL-OS
description:
POL-OS Alpha Demo
(0.1)

A BOSS RUSH where your DECISIONS and the COMBAT SKILLS of your partner Max, MIGHT save the inhabitants of the planet Elementos from their extinction... or NOT.

  • FIGHT  and  DEFEAT the OFFENDERS that are causing conflicts on the planet, then JUDGE them based on the actions they're causing.
  • Once and OFFENDER is DEFEATED, you can set them FREE, put them on JAIL or INCAPACITATE and send them to the hospital. Some will try to BRIBE you with money and special items, so be careful!
  • Multiple ENDINGS and OFFENDERS to confront based on the JUDGMENTS that have been made!

= GAME CONTROLS (IN BATTLE) =

[W][A][S][D] = Movement
[J]  = Melee attack
[K] = Distance attack
[SPACE] = Open POL-OS dock
[ESC] = Pause

= NOTES =

The current version is an Alpha Demo :)

Website: https://www.pol-os.com/
